alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 12:10AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorm will impact areas from Prescott to Paulden through 115 AM MST... At 1208 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Williamson Valley, or 7 miles southwest of Chino Valley, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chino Valley, Prescott Valley, Prescott, Dewey-humboldt, Wilhoit, Groom Creek Subdivision, Prescott Airport, Williamson Valley, Skull Valley, Prescott Gateway Mall, Iron Springs, Yavapai County Fairgrounds, Yavapai Campground, Downtown Prescott, Ponderosa Park, Indian Hill West Prescott, Oak Knoll Village, Paulden, Walnut Creek Ranger Station and Lynx Lake Dam. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 294 and 295, and between mile markers 299 and 362. State Route 89A between mile markers 318 and 327. State Route 69 between mile markers 282 and 296. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
